Class StudentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • StudentDAO

  • public class StudentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods that access the database and manipulate the student data in some way (CRUD).
    Author:
    Joshua McEwen (16012396)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StudentDAO() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean deleteStudent(int stuNumber)
      Deletes a student record into the database from a supplied student ID number.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Student> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves all students from the database, converts them into Student objects and returns as an ArrayList.
      static Student getStudent(int stuNumber)
      Retrieves a specific student from the database based on student number and returns as Student object.
      static boolean insertStudent(Student student)
      Inserts a student record into the database from a supplied Student object.
      static boolean updateStudent(Student student)
      Updates a student record into the database from a supplied Student object, using the supplied student number to identify existing record.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllStudents

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Student> getAllStudents()
        Retrieves all students from the database, converts them into Student objects and returns as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Student objects

      • getStudent

        public static Student getStudent(int stuNumber)
        Retrieves a specific student from the database based on student number and returns as Student object.
        Parameters:
        stuNumber - Student's student ID number
        Returns:
        Student object

      • insertStudent

        public static boolean insertStudent(Student student)
        Inserts a student record into the database from a supplied Student object.
        Parameters:
        student - Student object
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the insertion.

      • deleteStudent

        public static boolean deleteStudent(int stuNumber)
        Deletes a student record into the database from a supplied student ID number.
        Parameters:
        stuNumber - Student's student ID number
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the deletion.

      • updateStudent

        public static boolean updateStudent(Student student)
        Updates a student record into the database from a supplied Student object, using the supplied student number to identify existing record.
        Parameters:
        student - Student object
        Returns:
        true/false depending on the outcome of the update.
